name: Cut the Rope 2: Om Nom's Quest
name_original: Cut the Rope 2: Om Nom's Quest
description: ZeptoLab is a global gaming and entertainment company best known for developing the award-winning, hit franchise Cut the Rope, which includes Cut the Rope, Cut the Rope: Experiments, Cut the Rope: Time Travel, Cut the Rope 2 and Cut the Rope: Magic.
